description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fi2ei","text":"Proximity labeling (PL) coupled with mass spectrometry has emerged as a powerful technique to map proximal protein interactions in living cells. Large-scale sample processing for proximity proteomics necessitates a high-throughput workflow to reduce hands-on time and increase quantitative reproducibility. To address this issue, we developed a scalable and automated PL pipeline, including generation and characterization of monoclonal cell lines, automated enrichment of biotinylated proteins in a 96-well format, and optimization of the quantitative mass spectrometry (MS) acquisition method. Combined with data-independent acquisition (DIA) MS, our pipeline outperforms manual enrichment and data-dependent acquisition (DDA) MS regarding reproducibility of protein identification and quantification. We apply the pipeline to map subcellular proteomes for endosomes, late endosomes/lysosomes, the Golgi apparatus, and the plasma membrane. Moreover, using serotonin receptor (5HT2A) as a model, we investigated agonist-induced dynamics in protein-protein interactions. Importantly, the approach presented here is universally applicable for PL proteomics using all biotinylation-based PL enzymes, increasing both throughput and reproducibility of standard protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"r2j7","text":"Seeding 3-4 million cells in a 10-cm dish or 500K cells in a 6-well plate on Day One. The cells will be ~70% confluent after 48 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qqu5","text":"Lyse cells in 1ml RIPA buffer supplement with protease inhibitors, antioxidants, and DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Automated enrichment protocol for biotinylated proteins in Kingfisher
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bv19h","text":"For the automated biotinylation enrichment protocol, the Kingfisher Flex system (Thermo Fisher) is programmed to simultaneously process a maximum of 96 samples. This protocol below includes two parts, where part 1 (Plate 1-3) is for washing magnetic streptavidin beads and binding of the biotinylated proteins to beads, and part 2 (Plate 4-12) is for washing and collecting beads prior to Lys-C/trypsin digestion. The enrichment protocol is conducted in the cold room using deep-well plates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lmhj","text":"Reduce proteins by adding 5mM TCEP (final concentration, add 2ul of a 500mM TCEP solution) and incubate by shaking at 1000rpm @37 degrees for 30min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"731of","text":"The peptide samples are desalted using C18 96-well plate (BioPureSPE, HNS S18V-20mg, the Nest group) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"277rj","text":"Invert the dish/plate and pour out the medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fvga","text":"Immediately wash the cells 3x with ice-cold quencher solution (PBS+ 5mM Trolox, 10 mM sodium azide, 10 mM sodium ascorbate) for 1min (8mL for 10cm dish or 1mL for 6-well plate). Aspirate or invert to remove.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76voo","text":"Collect the cells in fresh quencher solution (8ml for 10cm plate or 1mL for 6-well plate) and pellet the cells by centrifugation at 3000g for 10min at 4 oC, remove supernatant and continue to cell lysis or freeze cell pellets in dry-ice for storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":153,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3h8na","text":"Perform a freeze-thaw cycle on dry ice and thaw in a   water bath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d9c8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fsq6","text":"Sonicate samples (5 seconds, 15% Duty Cycle x 2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8htc9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1tf90","text":"Transfer samples to 1.5ml Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9s9tn","text":"Centrifuge samples at 13,000xg for 10min at   and save the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjvo6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0n7j","text":"Take a small amount (25 uL) of the lysate for WB analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85vj8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqdmc","text":"Quantify protein concentration (supernatant) using 600nM Pierce Assay Kit with Detergent Compatibility Reagent (optional)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2o6ma","text":"1st day, protocol: Biotinylation APEX-MS part 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47},{"style":"sup","offset":1,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aufvk","text":"2nd day, protocol: Biotinylation APEX-MS part 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47},{"style":"sup","offset":1,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3h3j4","text":"Plate 1 (1 mL, stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"755m6","text":"a. RIPA buffer plate 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a49jn","text":"b. Add 80 uL of streptavidin beads to each well of 1 mL of RIPA buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee5uj","text":"Plate 3 (1 mL, fresh lysis)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lhp4","text":"a. Sample binding plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ujuj","text":"b. All samples from lysis are added to the plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lpnd","text":"c. Beads are transferred to this plate after 2x RIPA wash and left in this plate for overnight binding","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5bf2","text":"d. Tip comb is left in this plate at the end of the protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u2j","text":"Plate 4-6 (1 mL, stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qv9s","text":"a. RIPA buffer plates 4-6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2d57","text":"b. Continued from Plate 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fut54","text":"c. Beads with bond samples are collected from Plate 3 and transferred to these plates for 3x RIPA wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cu7a","text":"Plate 7 (1 mL, stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcn7j","text":"a. KCl solution wash plate (1M KCl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u4sp","text":"b. Stock solution prepared and can be stored for a long time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fmot","text":"Plate 8 (1 mL, stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a78n2","text":"a. Na2CO3 solution wash plate (0.1M Na2CO3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bomv","text":"b. Stock solution prepared and can be stored for a long time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9feva","text":"Plate 9 (1 mL, fresh)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pie8","text":"a. 2M urea in 50mM Tris-HCl [pH=8.0] wash plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"finpb","text":"b. 1 M Tris-HCl is ready","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g551","text":"c. Urea prepared freshly each time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85k41","text":"Plate 10-11 (1 mL, fresh)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nvpu","text":"a. 50mM Tris-HCl [pH=8.0] wash plates 10-11","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3bba","text":"b. Prepared from 1M Tris-HCl solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3buv6","text":"Plate 12 (200 uL, fresh)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auqv4","text":"a. Digestion plate with 2M urea in 50mM Tris-HCl [pH=8.0] buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m9ln","text":"b. Beads and tip comb are left in this plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lar9","text":"Plate 2 (1 mL, stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ld7d","text":"a. RIPA buffer plate 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emcr1","text":"b. 1 mL of RIPA buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8aebe","text":"Protein alkylation by adding iodoacetamide to 5mM (final concentration, add 2ul of a 500mM iodoacetamide solution) and incubate by shaking at 1000rpm @RT for 30min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vpp6","text":"Quench IAA with 5mM DTT (final concentration, add 2ul of a 500mM iodoacetamide solution).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcpi4","text":"Add 2ul of trypsin (~1ug), and 1 ul of Lys-C (2ug/ul) and incubate O/N at 37 degrees under shaking at 1000 rpm. The on-bead digestion is set to 37 oC for 6h and RT for 12h. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":147,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2utg","text":"Following morning add additional 0.5 ug of trypsin and incubate an additional 2h at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kqv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diit0","text":"Transfer supernatant to a new 96-well plate using magnetic rack, and acidify sample with 10% trifluoroacetic acid (TFA) to ~pH2 (~0.5% TFA final).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"anmo5","text":"Wash the plate three times with 100 µL 80% acetonitrile (ACN)/0.1% TFA by centrifugation at 800 rpm for 1 min","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4laga","text":"Equilibrate the plate three times with 100 µL 2% ACN/0.1% TFA by centrifugation at 1200 rpm for 2 min","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8bgnj","text":"Load samples by centrifugation at 1600 rpm for 2 min","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cg0t5","text":"Re-load samples by centrifugation at 1600 rpm for 2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d84rc","text":"Wash the plate 3 times with 100 µL 2% ACN/0.1% TFA by centrifugation at 1600 rpm for 2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cvjs","text":"Elute twice with 55 µL 50% ACN/0.25% formic acid (FA) by centrifugation at 1600 rpm for 2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ednk9","text":"Dry the samples by vacuum centrifugation (~2h).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91qn7","text":"Add 2mM H2O2-containing medium (DMEM+10% FBS) to the 10-cm dish or 6-well plate to have a final concentration of 1mM H2O2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aloor","text":"Perform APEX proximity labeling on Day Three. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6p58","text":"Add doxycycline (final concentration of 1ug/mL) to induce cells for 24 hours on Day Two. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bjqir","text":"Allow the reaction to go for 45sec at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abava","text":"Store the dried samples at    or resuspend them in 20 uL 0.1% formic acid for mass spec analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4rmuf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vrg0","text":"Incubate cells with 500uM BP in complete medium pre-warmed to 37 oC for 30min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":65,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: A proximity proteomics pipeline for subcellular proteome and protein interaction mapping
title_html: A proximity proteomics pipeline for subcellular proteome and protein interaction mapping

versions.title: A proximity proteomics pipeline for subcellular proteome and protein interaction mapping
versions.title_html: A proximity proteomics pipeline for subcellular proteome and protein interaction mapping
